mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, p.* from (select distinct p_code, p_name, p_c_bcode, p_c_mcode, p_hit, p_img, p_price from product order by p_hit desc) p) where rn <= 8

select * from ( select rownum rn, p.* from (select distinct p_code, p_name, p_c_bcode, p_c_mcode, p_hit, p_img, p_price, TO_CHAR(p_date,'YYYYMMDD') p_date from product order by p_date desc) p) where rn <= 8
